data.text:
@healthdpt COVID19 vaccine data updated to show:
https://t.co/3G0vfio9DF

@healthdpt "The system is broken" says an ED health worker. An increase in covid patients is exacerbating the dire situation after an elderly lady died after waiting 8 hrs in an ambulance. Yet RS said 2 weeks ago the time was right to lift all remaining protections!! Was it?
@healthdpt What about those shielding? We've been shielding for 2yrs and continue to do so.
